text: Anatoliy Doroshenko (14 August 1953) is an association footballer from the former Soviet Union who played for FC Chornomorets Odessa. In 1979 Doroshenko played couple of games for Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR.Football at the 1979 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR ==References== ==External links== * Profile at the football.odessa.ua * Anniversary of the Odessa football legend. Odessa city portal. 14 August 2013. title: Anatoliy Doroshenko
